        java.lang.String authentication(java.lang.String username,

        Parameters:
        username - of the member
        password - of the member
        Returns:

      • registration

        int registration(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password,
                 java.lang.String password2,
                 int year,
                 int month,
                 int day,
                 java.lang.String sex,
                 java.lang.String phoneNumber,

                 java.lang.String surname,
                 java.lang.String country,
                 java.lang.String city,
                 java.lang.String address,
                 java.lang.String ip_Address)
        This method registers a new user in the database
        Parameters:
        username - of the member
        password - of the member
        password2 - repetion of the password
        year - when the person has bore
        month - when the person has bore
        day - when the person has bore
        sex - of the person
        phoneNumber - of the member
        email - of the member
        name - of the member
        surname - of the member
        country - of the member
        city - of the member
        address - of the member
        ip_Address - of the member
        Returns:
        error code depending of what happened 0-successfully registered 1-username already in use 2-email already in use 3-username and email already in use -1-Error in the database -2 - username not allowed -5 - Password does not match -6 - UnderAge

      • updatePassword

        int updatePassword(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String token,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String password2)
        This method updates the password of a given username
        Parameters:
        username - which password is going to be changed
        token - that is going to be used to verify the username
        password - new password to change
        password2 - repetea the new password
        Returns:
        integer errorcode 0 - successfully changed 1 - user does not exist 2 - password is the same -1- Error in the database -2 - User and token does not match -3 - The password does not match with the second Please see updateUserData
